solution_line_template: On the second day, they collected {initial_cans_day1} + {daily_increase} = <<{initial_cans_day1}+{daily_increase}={cans_day2}>>{cans_day2} cans.
On the third day, they collected {cans_day2} + {daily_increase} = <<{cans_day2}+{daily_increase}={cans_day3}>>{cans_day3} cans.
On the fourth day, they collected {cans_day3} + {daily_increase} = <<{cans_day3}+{daily_increase}={cans_day4}>>{cans_day4} cans.
On the fifth day, they collected {cans_day4} + {daily_increase} = <<{cans_day4}+{daily_increase}={cans_day5}>>{cans_day5} cans.

Thus, the goal of William's class is to collect a total of {initial_cans_day1} + {cans_day2} + {cans_day3} + {cans_day4} + {cans_day5} =<<{initial_cans_day1}+{cans_day2}+{cans_day3}+{cans_day4}+{cans_day5}={total_cans_per_week}>>{total_cans_per_week} cans of food per week.
